power.title: Blackwarp Shot
power.fluff: When your projectile infused with shadow magic hits its target, you warp darkness surrounding both of you to slightly change your positions
power.section: Attack:Rangedweaponone creatureDexterity vs. AC
Hit:1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you teleport the target up to a number of squares equal to the number of your shrouds on it.
Level 21:2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and teleport up to 1 + your number of shrouds.
Effect:You teleport up to 1 square, or up to 2 squares if the target has at least two of your shrouds on it.
Level 21:Teleport up to 2 square or 3 squares, respectively.

power.title: Blade in the Back
power.fluff: You step into your foe's shadow and instantly appear behind it, giving it no time to readjust
power.section: Prerequisite: You must have the shadow step Assassin class power.
true Effect: Before resolving the attack, you teleport up to 3 squares to another space adjacent to the target.
Level 21:Teleport up to 4 squares.
true You count as also being in the space you occupied, possibly allowing you to flank the target with yourself for this attack.
Attack: melee weapon one creature adjacent to you Dexterity vs. AC
true Hit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, plus additional damage equal to your number of shrouds on the target if you have combat advantage against it.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, plus additional damage equal to twice your number of shrounds on the target if you have combat advantage against it.
Miss: If you flank the target, it takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
1 Level 21: Equal to 2 + your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Caress of Black Flame
power.fluff: You carve your foe with black fire that is intensified by your pain
power.section: Attack:Meleeweaponone creatureDexterity vs. Fortitude
Hit:1[W] + Dexterity modifier fire and necrotic damage.
Level 21:2[W] + Dexterity modifier fire and necrotic damage.
If you are bloodied, you deal additional fire and necrotic damage equal to twice your number of shrouds on the target.
Level 11:Equal to three times your number of shrouds.
Level 21:Equal to four times your number of shrouds.
Miss:Your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus fire and necrotic damage if you are bloodied.
Level 21:2 + your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus fire and necrotic damage.

power.title: Executioner's Noose
power.fluff: You gather shadows in the form of a noose, cast it around your foe's neck, and pull

true 1 Level 21: 2d6 + Dexterity modifier force damage, and pull up to 1 + your number of shrouds.
true 1 Critical: You can knock the target prone. The target can attempt a saving throw to avoid being knocked prone.

power.title: Inescapable Blade
power.fluff: You stop several feet away from you foe and slash with your weapon, and your weapon's shadow closes the distance, not slowed down by physical obstacles
power.section: Attack: Melee weapon +1 reach one creature Dexterity vs. AC
1 If the target has at least two of your shrouds on it, you increase the reach by an additional +1, or by an additional +2 if the target has four of your shrouds on it
1 This attack ignores cover and superior cover
true Hit: 1[W] damage.
true 1 Level 21: 2[W] damage.
This does not allow you to trigger reactive strikes against creatures that aren't adjacent to you unless you normally could do so.

power.title: Lashing Shrouds
power.fluff: You direct your shrouds outward from the foe they cover, lashing at the life force of another
power.section: Using this power provokes reactive strikes as if you had used a ranged attack
Attack: Melee 2, using the creature your shrouds are on as the point of origin one creature Dexterity vs. Reflex
1 If you have at least 3 of your shrouds on the creature used as the point of origin, you can target two creatures
true Hit: Necrotic damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus + your number of shrouds on the creature used as the point of origin.
true 1 Level 11: Equal to 2 + your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus + your number of shrouds.
true 1 Level 21: Equal to 2 + your Dexterity modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus + twice your number of shrouds on the creature used as the point of origin.
Miss: Half damage.

power.section: Attack: Melee touch Ranged 3/6 one creature Dexterity vs. Reflex

true Hit: 1d4 + Dexterity modifier damage, plus 1 damage for each creature adjacent to the target.
true 1 Level 21: 2d4 + Dexterity modifier damage, plus 2 damage for each creature adjacent to the target.

true 1 Level 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier force damage.

power.title: Sinister Pursuit
power.fluff: The shadow of your projectile hounds your foe, gnawing at them a second time if they don't run far enough
power.section: Effect:You can choose to give this power the Fear and Psychic keywords. If you do, the damage the target takes if it doesn't move far enough is psychic damage.
Attack:Rangedweaponone creatureDexterity vs. AC
Hit:1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
Level 21:2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

Effect:If the target doesn't end its turn a number of squares away from where it was when you made this attack, it takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus. The number of squares equals 2 + your number of shrouds on it.
Level 11:3 + your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage.
Level 21:6 + your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage, and a number of squares equal to 3 + your number of shrouds.

true Hit: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

Level 21:Equal to three times your Constitution modifier.
